infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Strathspace uses your camera to take profile photos. For example, you can capture a new selfie to add to your dating profile so other students can see what you look like.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Strathspace accesses your photo library to let you choose existing photos for your profile. For example, you can select up to 6 photos to showcase your personality and interests to potential matches.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Strathspace saves photos to your library when you choose to download images from chat conversations. For example, you can save a photo that a match shared with you.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Strathspace uses speech recognition to convert your voice into search queries so you can find matches by speaking.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Strathspace needs microphone access so you can use voice search to find matches.

plugins.microphonePermission: Strathspace needs microphone access so you can use voice search to find matches.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Strathspace uses speech recognition to convert your voice into search queries.
